name: PUZZLESCRIPT LAWNMOWER
description:
68 levels.  30 minutes of gameplay.  The lawns will be mowed.  The ground will be shaved.

CREDITS

Game - by Winterbeak, source code here

Music - Nostalgia and Nexus Pelican by Patricia Taxxon under the CC BY-SA 3.0 license

Puzzlescript Game Bar - by PedroPSI

Testing - ThatOneGuy

Made in 48 + a few hours for the FUNDAV Mystery Game Jam sponsored by MysteryFunHouse

If you cannot run the game, it may be because you have script blockers enabled.
